name: DoraAssistant
0:
”Alexa, open dora assistant”
”tell me a joke”
”help”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dora assistant
des:
This is an AI companion that specializes in leisurely chatting with users. It has two functions.
Function 1: Process queries
- When you ask a question, it uses bingWebSearch() to locate the appropriate response.
Function 2: Casual conversation
- According to the topic you propose, have a pleasant communication with it, so that you get pleasure in the communication.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
